author: simonetripodi
msg: moved the AnnotationRuleProviderUtils code to the FromAnnotationsRuleSet

author: kkolinko
msg: Return an error page rather than a zero length 200 response if the forward to the login or error page fails during FORM authentication

author: jonesde
msg: Now if currency conversion fails a zero will be returned for the product cost, ie the service was unable to determine the product code in the desired currency; note that this uses the new ignore error behavior for the break-on-error attribute introduced in rev 903567

author: jonesde
msg: Change based on recent dev list discussion so that break-on-error acts more like an ignore error type of thing; when combined with require-new-transaction=true this will effectively result in no issues from the called service bubbling up to the calling service; with this change manually clearing out the error message and response code is no longer necessary

author: vdichev
msg: Use List instead of Set to avoid hashCode errors
